name: Tangy Chicken with Tomatoes and Herbs
ingredients: 16 oz. tomatoes, drained, cut into bite size pieces
instructions: In skillet sauce onion garlic and herbs in oil until onion is tender crisp.
Stir in tomatoes and ketchup, vinegar, brown sugar, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer covered 45-50 minutes until chicken is tender.
Thicken sauce with cornstarch water mix.
Serve chicken and sauce with noodles.
